indications: Indications short-term blood loss in menorrhagia
name: ETAMSYLATE
cautions:
Cautions exclude structural or histological causes of menorrhagia,
or fibroids causing distortion of the uterine cavity, before initiating
treatment
side-effects:
Side-effects nausea, vomiting, diarrhoea, fever (discontinue
treatment), headache, rashes
